ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Customer data privacy message for customer form:
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mijozlarning ma'lumotlari Maxfiylik xabari Mijoz shakli uchun:

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Reassure your customers, display a short notice to let them know you care about privacy.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mijozlaringizni ishontiring, ularga maxfiylik haqida qayg'urishingizni aytadigan qisqa xabarni namoyish eting.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The customer data privacy message will be displayed in the customer form
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mijoz ma'lumotlari Maxfiylik xabari mijoz shakliga ko'rsatiladi

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The personal data you provide is used to answer queries, process orders or allow access to specific information. You have the right to modify and delete all the personal information found in the "My Account" page.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Siz taqdim etadigan shaxsiy ma'lumotlar so'rovlar, jarayonlar buyurtmalariga javob berish yoki aniq ma'lumotlarga kirishga ruxsat berish uchun ishlatiladi.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Tip: If the customer privacy message is too long to be written directly in the form, you can add a link to one of your pages. This can easily be created via the "Pages" page under the "Design" menu.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Maslahat: Agar Maxfiylik xabari to'g'ridan-to'g'ri shaklda yozilgan bo'lsa, siz sahifalaringizdan biriga bog'lanishingiz mumkin.
